channel.title: Forever PK 317 loading 602/525 dung,summoning, chaotics, nex armours alot more!
channel.description:
[img]http://s14.postimage.org/rg2pugmkh/6_forever.png[/img] [b][i][u][size=12pt]WELCOME TO FOREVER PK![/size][/u][/i][/b] We are one server that takes our time to speak to our members one on one to ensure there having a great time. We always make sure we have new updates to make sure we have a stable and fun server.
Features:
- ClanChat - Duel Arena - Double XP Rings - Fully equipped Voteshop - Decent and fun economy. - 24.7 Uptime - Voting System - Trading - Webclient - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - Active helpful staff - 4 Levels of Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - Summoning - 100% working leeches - Runescape like Combat - redone accuracy to be like runescape - Working Korasi’s Sword - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - Working Teleblock - Yell with custom tags and loyalty title. - Daily Tournament Events
Now for a few pictures (will be updated with time) [u]Click to enlarge[/u] [u][/u] [url=http://postimage.org/image/cf8fsejm3/][img]http://s9.postimage.org/cf8fsejm3/Untitled.jpg[/img][/url] [size=14pt][u][i][b]Completely custom home! Great place to hangout![/b][/i][/u][/size]
[url=http://postimage.org/image/yd0b8g98r/][img]http://s9.postimage.org/yd0b8g98r/theiving_and_shops.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/image/4wkp612vf/][img]http://s9.postimage.org/4wkp612vf/pk_store_tickets.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=14pt][b]Server is still fairly new! There is alot to be fixed/updated, so expect more to come![/b][/size]
[size=14pt]There is much more to see, come join us! Friendly community, Great staff, Fun and great times to be had by all! Hoping to see you there :)[/size]
[size=24pt][url=http://Foreverpk.net]Foreverpk.net[/url][/size]

item.description:
@nickyyy wrote:

nolan2131:

Your amazing home seems amazingly cluttered. There may be a reason we have not seen it before lol… Good luck with this project though, I hope you’re successful and learn a lot.

thanks

item.title: Forever PK 317 loading 602/525 dung,summoning, chaotics, nex armours alot more!
item.dc:creator: @nickyyy nickyyy
item.description:
@nickyyy wrote:


[size=12pt]WELCOME TO FOREVER PK![/size]
We are one server that takes our time to speak to our members one on one to ensure there having a great time. We always make sure we have new updates to make sure we have a stable and fun server.

Features:

  • ClanChat
  • Duel Arena
  • Double XP Rings
  • Fully equipped Voteshop
  • Decent and fun economy.
  • 24.7 Uptime
  • Voting System
  • Trading
  • Webclient
  • AutoCasting
  • 100% Private Messaging
  • Active helpful staff
  • 4 Levels of Donator status
  • Regular updates!
  • Completely Lag Free!
  • Summoning
  • 100% working leeches
  • Runescape like Combat
  • redone accuracy to be like runescape
  • Working Korasi’s Sword
  • Multi Barrages
  • Xp Counter
  • Working weapon specs and effects
  • Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
  • All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars
  • Working Teleblock
  • Yell with custom tags and loyalty title.
  • Daily Tournament Events

Now for a few pictures (will be updated with time)
Click to enlarge


[size=14pt]Completely custom home! Great place to hangout![/size]


[size=14pt]Server is still fairly new! There is alot to be fixed/updated, so expect more to come![/size]

[size=14pt]There is much more to see, come join us! Friendly community, Great staff, Fun and great times to be had by all! Hoping to see you there :)[/size]

[size=24pt]Foreverpk.net[/size]
